name: Time Dilation
short_description:
This program was written with Visual Basic. It is designed to illustrate the relative dimensional properties predicted in a eight dimensional universe that is exponentially expanding. There are two sets of time-space dimensions; linear and curved. These dimensions multiply each other, as the universe expands in it's eight dimensions. 

After working with this program for awhile, I discovered that it only works with objects in separate galaxies sufficiently away from each other and the galaxy of the observer. This is due to galaxies orbital velocity law, a property not included in this program. Maybe at some point I'll create a better program with such variables.
summary: Time dilation equations for the First Flash cosmological model.
